archimate:Requirement.name: CM-8(9): System Component Inventory | Assignment of Components to Systems
archimate:Requirement.documentation: (a) Assign system components to a system; and (b) Receive an acknowledgement from [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] of this assignment.

properties.value: System components that are not assigned to a system may be unmanaged, lack the required protection, and become an organizational vulnerability.
